DOC.brief_summary: The study aim establish whether one month postoperative immobilization compare early passive motion rotator cuff arthroscopic repair small medium rupture double row technique heal significance .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Postoperative Immobilization Healing After Rotator Cuff Arthroscopic Repair
DOC.criteria: Patients skeletally mature ( old 18 year old ) Small medium rupture rotator cuff Repaired arthroscopic double row technique Impossibility perform MRI ( claustrophobic , pacemaker , heart brain metallic implant ) AC arthritis mumford procedure Smokers Diabetes Postoperative complication ( severe pain , thrombosis , infection ) Psychiatric disorder
